name: vx-twitter-share
description: Adds a button to copy post link with 'vx' prefix to clipboard
author: Lucky2307

scripts.postinstall: mkdir utils && cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js utils/ && npx terser node_modules/lodash.debounce/index.js -c -m -o utils/debounce.js
scripts.build: mkdir vx-twitter-share; cp ./manifest.json vx-twitter-share/ -r; cp images vx-twitter-share/ -r; cp scripts vx-twitter-share/ -r; cp options vx-twitter-share/ -r; cp utils vx-twitter-share/ -r
